name: ERDDAP (Environmental Research Division's Data Access Program) Data Catalog
description: ERDDAP is a data server providing a consistent interface to download subsets of scientific datasets (particularly oceanographic, satellite, and buoy data) in common file formats, make graphs and maps, and view or access metadata. ERDDAP consolidates access to scientific data via OPeNDAP, WCS, SOS, and more, and is operated by organizations ranging from government agencies to research institutes.
